Class CreateGamePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JSplitPane
            • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.view.games.creation.CreateGamePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IValidateButtons, ICreateGamePanel, IGamePanel, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class CreateGamePanel
extends javax.swing.JSplitPane
implements ICreateGamePanel, IValidateButtons
    Used to create a new Planning Poker game using the input of the user.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • CreateGamePanel

        public CreateGamePanel(Game game)
        Creates a NewCreateGamePanel with the game setting the fields for the panel. This is used to edit an existing game in the model that has not yet been made active
        Parameters:
        game - the game that we are editing

      • CreateGamePanel

        Creates a NewCreateGamePanel This is equivalent to calling NewCreateGamePanel(null)

        withError - sees if there is an error or not

        public Game getGame()
        Description copied from interface: IGamePanel
        Gets the game for the panel. This is used for comparisons to make sure that we are re-displaying the correct game when ask to show a panel in the ViewEventController
